Scene:
The Dry Riverbed at Shichijo
(Shichijō kawara / 七条河原)

Play: The Loyal Samurai (太平記忠臣講釈)

Production: February 1972

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Sakitayū (豊竹咲大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Kanotarō (鶴澤叶太郎)
